articles.description:
Arqwa wrote:

Flamedart wrote:

What is wiki monday?
Wiki Monday“ does not exist and is in fact an invention of @wangat, he is making a joke because it is called ”Wiki Wednesday" and we are not the last Wednesday of the month (when this topic should have been opened) but the Monday (of the following month)… It's the vacations and LiFaytheGoblin (I also hope for him/her) may never even be active on the right day.
lol yes, I made that up
